content: chain 1 turn single_crochet in nx 4 sts half_double_crochet in nx 8 sts single_crochet in nx st and in 3 unworked sts from row 3 16 sts row 6 chain 1 turn single_crochet in nx 4 sts half_double_crochet in nx 8 sts single_crochet in nx 4 sts 16 sts row 7 31 repeat row 2 6 five times more fo leaving a long end for sewing sew side seams together with your end then with the same end weave in and out of the ends of row pull tight secure end and weave in stuff pumpkin firmly with beginning tail on other end weave in and out of ends of row pull tight secure ends and weave sew pumpkin body to head with tail from head pumpkin cap with orange chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3 2 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet around join to beg single_crochet 24 single_crochet fo leaving a long end for sewing stem with brown chain 6 row 1 single_crochet in back ridge of 2nd chain from hook and across 5 single_crochet fo leaving a long end for sewing sew stem to centre of hat sew hat to head weave in ends copyright melanie blake 2008 page 2 for spider spider legs make 8 note each leg should measure approx 6 with black make a magic_ring round 1 5 single_crochet in ring pull tight to close 5 single_crochet round 2 21 single_crochet around 5 single_crochet fo leaving a long end for sewing insert a prepared pipe cleaner into each leg cut end leaving 1 insert pipe cleaner end into pumpkin body and sew leg onto body with yarn end for bat bat ears make 2 with black chain 6 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across 5 single_crochet row 2 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet across 5 single_crochet row 4 turn do not chain 1 single_crochet 3 decrease 1 single_crochet fo leaving long end for sewing sew to top of head on either side of pumpkin hat weave in ends bat feet make 2 with black chain 8 join with slip_stitch to first chain chain 10 join with slip_stitch to first chain chain 8 join with slip_stitch to first chain fo leaving long end for sewing sew to bottom of pumpkin body as shown in pic weave in ends copyright melanie blake 2008 page 3 bat wings make 2 with black chain 15 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and across 14 single_crochet row 2 chain 1 turn single_crochet across to last 2 sts decrease over last 2 sts 13 single_crochet row 3 turn do not chain 1 decrease single_crochet across 12 single_crochet row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet in nx 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet in nx st double_crochet in nx st
